case.title: Click on this link lead on Home page foк authorized user

User can't create Article title shorter than 5 symbols
Check if error message appears if user leaves Article title field empty.
User can create two or more articles with the same title.
User can't create Article title longer than 240 symbols
User can create Article title with letters, numbers, special characters, spaces
User can't create article title just with the spaces
User can't create article title with the spaces at the beginning of the row.

Text field "Write your article (in markdowm)" can't be shorter than 20 symbols
Text field "Write your article (in markdowm)" can't be longer than 9000 symbols
User can't add any attachments (pictures, photos, links)

User can't create "Write your article (in markdowm)" field with the spaces at the beginning of the row
"Write your article (in markdowm)" field can be created with letters, numbers, special characters, spaces
User can leave "enter tags" field empty.
Field "Enter tags" can contain letters and numbers
User can create tags for his article for future sorting
"Enter tags" field can't be shorter than 2 symbols
"Enter tags" field can't be longer than 30 symbols
User can't create the text field "Enter tags" just with letters and numbers.
User can't use spesial symbols like !@#$%^&*()_+ in "Enter tags" field.
User can't add to one article more than 10 tags.
User can create tags with “#” symbol in the beginning.

User can delete article by clicking [Delete article] button.
User can edit previously created article by clicking [Edit article] button.
